PQTestExePath: <Replace with the path to PQTest.exe. Ex: 'C:\Users\ContosoUser\.vscode\extensions\powerquery.vscode-powerquery-sdk-0.2.3-win32-x64\.nuget\Microsoft.PowerQuery.SdkTools.2.114.4\tools\PQTest.exe'>
ExtensionPath: <Replace with the path to .mez or .pqx file for the extension. Ex: 'C:\dev\ConnectorName\ConnectorName.mez'>
TestSettingsDirectoryPath: <Replace with path to directory containing the JSON Test Setting files. Ex: 'C:\dev\DataConnectors\testframework\tests\ConnectorConfigs\ConnectorName\Settings'>
TestSettingsList: <Replace with  the list of JSON Setting files Ex: SanitySettings.json StandardSettings.json>
ValidateQueryFolding: <Replace with True/False to indicate if query folding needs to be verified>
DetailedResults: <Replace with True/False to indicate if detailed results needs to be displayed>
JSONResults: <Replace with True/False to indicate if detailed results needs to be displayed>
